Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="Command"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Function" Type="System.String" Value="Account.AssignMsisdnToCampaign"/> <Attribute Name="TerminalDeviceID" Type="System.Int64" Value="{0}"/> <Attribute Name="PersonalAccountNumber" Type="System.Int64" Value="{1}"/> <Attribute Name="Msisdn" Type="System.String" Value="{2}"/> <Attribute Name="CampaignId" Type="System.Int32" Value="{3}"/> <Attribute Name="TariffPlanId" Type="System.Int32" Value="{4}"/> <Attribute Name="DateFrom" Type="System.DateTime" Value="{5}"/> <Attribute Name="MsisdnStartDate" Type="System.DateTime" Value="{6}"/> <Attribute Name="FirstEventDate" Type="System.DateTime" Value="{6}"/> </Attributes> </DataSet>
